bug.author: hsali
bug.description:
I was installing spacy from source. When I executed the last command . <denchmark-code>pip install -e . </denchmark-code>
this error log appeared. ` pip install -e . Obtaining file:///home/shehbaz/Documents/practice/spacy/spaCy Complete output from command python setup.py egg_info: warning: vocab.pyx:397:26: local variable 'orth' referenced before assignment warning: vocab.pyx:397:49: local variable 'lexeme' referenced before assignment <denchmark-code>Error compiling Cython file: ------------------------------------------------------------ ... cdef int assign_tag(self, TokenC* token, tag) except -1: if isinstance(tag, basestring): tag_id = self.reverse_index[self.strings[tag]] else: tag_id = self.reverse_index[tag] self.assign_tag_id(token, tag_id) ^ ------------------------------------------------------------
morphology.pyx:42:32: Cannot convert 'TokenC *' to Python object Processing lexeme.pyx Processing typedefs.pyx Processing vocab.pyx Processing attrs.pyx Processing gold.pyx Processing morphology.pyx Traceback (most recent call last): File "/home/shehbaz/Documents/practice/spacy/spaCy/bin/cythonize.py", line 156, in <module> run(args.root) File "/home/shehbaz/Documents/practice/spacy/spaCy/bin/cythonize.py", line 147, in run process(base, filename, db) File "/home/shehbaz/Documents/practice/spacy/spaCy/bin/cythonize.py", line 113, in process preserve_cwd(base, process_pyx, root + '.pyx', root + '.cpp') File "/home/shehbaz/Documents/practice/spacy/spaCy/bin/cythonize.py", line 78, in preserve_cwd func(*args) File "/home/shehbaz/Documents/practice/spacy/spaCy/bin/cythonize.py", line 60, in process_pyx raise Exception('Cython failed') Exception: Cython failed Cythonizing sources Traceback (most recent call last): File "<string>", line 1, in <module> File "/home/shehbaz/Documents/practice/spacy/spaCy/setup.py", line 229, in <module> setup_package() File "/home/shehbaz/Documents/practice/spacy/spaCy/setup.py", line 180, in setup_package generate_cython(root, 'spacy') File "/home/shehbaz/Documents/practice/spacy/spaCy/setup.py", line 122, in generate_cython raise RuntimeError('Running cythonize failed') RuntimeError: Running cythonize failed
---------------------------------------- </denchmark-code>
Command "python setup.py egg_info" failed with error code 1 in /home/shehbaz/Documents/practice/spacy/spaCy/ ` If you're looking for help with your code, consider posting a question on StackOverflow instead: <denchmark-link:http://stackoverflow.com/questions/tagged/spacy>http://stackoverflow.com/questions/tagged/spacy</denchmark-link> --> <denchmark-h:h2>Your Environment</denchmark-h>
Operating System: Ubuntu 16.04 LTS ** Used: first time.** spaCy Used: latest from this repository Environment Information: virtual environment, python 2.7.12

comments.comment: I was hacking on master and broke the build :(. Sorry folks.
This thread has been automatically locked since there has not been any recent activity after it was closed. Please open a new issue for related bugs.
